markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 1"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Know Your Own](/Feats.aspx?ID=1409) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Elf" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=58" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Advanced Player's Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=39) pg. 43 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

</column>

---

You've spent countless hours studying the history of elves on your world and beyond and are a studied expert in your people's ways. If you critically fail a check to [Recall Knowledge](/Actions.aspx?ID=26) about elves, elven society, or elven history, you get a failure instead.
name: Know Your Own
